title: Bug 3970 - Preferences - UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files
description: Bug 3970 - The Windows workstations are used as X terminals and to run Eclipse since PCs are cheaper than Unix boxes.
OB: When a new file is created on Windows, it currently has Windows line delimiters.
EB: Even if the new file is created on Windows, it should have Unix line delimiters since the end product is a Unix product. There should be a UI (Preference) provided by the Workbench to define the line delimiter for new files. The possible values should include Dos/Windows, Mac, Unix, and the default platform line delimiter. The UI should be provided by the Workbench to ensure that all plugins use the same line delimiter for new files.
SR: To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 1. Use a Unix and Windows workstation to develop a Unix product/program.
